title: Did the national football player Isaiah Crowwell post a photo of a police officer being killed?
subtitle: Cleveland Browns once again ran the artist's show on Instagram in July 2016; then he quickly deleted it and apologized over and over again.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Cleveland Browns is running back to Isaiah Kroll once, putting on his Instagram profile an artist who presents a masked man who cuts the throat of a police officer.
